app.title: Smart News Extractor
app.subtitle: One-click extraction of news content from the web. Supports 12 mainstream platforms including WeChat, Toutiao, NetEase, Sohu, Tencent, Lenny, Naver, Detik, Quora, BBC, CNN, and Twitter/X

platforms.title: Supported Platforms
platforms.selectDesc: Choose the platform to extract content from, or paste a link for auto-detection

input.title: Enter URL

placeholders.wechat: Paste or enter WeChat article link, e.g.: https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/xxxxx
placeholders.toutiao: Paste or enter Toutiao article link, e.g.: https://www.toutiao.com/article/7123456789012345678
placeholders.netease: Paste or enter NetEase news link, e.g.: https://www.163.com/news/article/KC12OUHK000189FH.html
placeholders.sohu: Paste or enter Sohu news link, e.g.: https://www.sohu.com/a/945014338_160447
placeholders.tencent: Paste or enter Tencent news link, e.g.: https://news.qq.com/rain/a/20251016A07W8J00
placeholders.lenny: Paste or enter Lenny's Newsletter link, e.g.: https://www.lennysnewsletter.com/p/article-title
placeholders.naver: Paste or enter Naver blog link, e.g.: https://blog.naver.com/username/223618759620
placeholders.detik: Paste or enter Detik News link, e.g.: https://news.detik.com/berita/d-7123456/news-title
placeholders.quora: Paste or enter Quora answer link, e.g.: https://www.quora.com/question/answers/123456789
placeholders.bbc: Paste or enter BBC News link, e.g.: https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/c797qlx93j0o
placeholders.cnn: Paste or enter CNN News link, e.g.: https://edition.cnn.com/2025/10/27/uk/sami-hamdi-detained-ice-intl
placeholders.twitter: Paste or enter Twitter/X link, e.g.: https://x.com/username/status/1234567890
placeholders.default: Paste or enter news link, supports WeChat, Toutiao, Lenny, Naver, Detik, Quora, BBC, CNN, Twitter

input.cookieHint: Public tweets can be extracted without Cookie. For protected tweets, paste your x.com Cookie (get it from browser DevTools after logging in)

errors.extractFailed: Extraction failed, please try again later
errors.networkError: Network error, please check your connection
